Lift genome across builds

Source: R/utils.R
LIFTOVER.Rd

Lift genome across builds

LIFTOVER(
  dat,
  build.conversion = "hg19.to.hg38",
  chrom_col = "CHR",
  start_col = "POS",
  end_col = "POS",
  chr_format = "NCBI",
  return_as_granges = T,
  verbose = T
)

Arguments

build_conversion

"hg19.to.hg38" (default) or "hg38.to.hg19.

See also

Other utils: dataframe_2_vcf(), rbind_GRanges()

Examples

data("BST1")
gr.lifted <- LIFTOVER(dat=BST1, build.conversion="hg19.to.hg38")

#> [1] "XGR:: Lifting genome build: hg19.to.hg38"
#> Start at 2021-06-22 16:46:38
#> 
#> 
#> End at 2021-06-22 16:46:39
#> Runtime in total is: 1 secs
